RMU-ZONES.SettingToggleHint: Toggle the visualisation of combat facings and weapon reach rings.
RMU-ZONES.SettingColorFrontHint: Colour for the front-facing combat zone (default: Green).
RMU-ZONES.SettingColorFlankHint: Colour for the flank combat zones (default: Yellow).
RMU-ZONES.SettingColorRearHint: Colour for the rear combat zone (default: Red).
RMU-ZONES.SettingColorSpokeHint: Colour for the sector dividing lines (default: Dark Grey).
RMU-ZONES.SettingAlphaHint: How transparent the filled zones should be (0.0 = invisible, 1.0 = solid).
RMU-ZONES.SettingMetricFactorHint: Multiplies the scene grid distance by this amount to convert it to feet. (e.g. 1.5m x 3.33 = 5ft).
RMU-ZONES.SettingReachShowAllHint: If enabled, reach rings are always visible for all tokens (Classic Mode). If disabled (Default), rings are only shown for tokens you own, hover over, or select (Smart Mode).
RMU-ZONES.SettingColorFacingHint: Colour for the front-facing triangle indicator.
